NEW_NUMBER.name: NEW_NUMBER
NEW_NUMBER.heading: SURE THING
NEW_NUMBER.text: We're happy to give you a new number, but our promotional service offer is available only to those who transfer their number. Don't worry, you can still join the Inner Circle and get access to all of our amazing perks, you'll just pay the standard service rate.

RESET_PASSWORD.name: RESET_PASSWORD
RESET_PASSWORD.heading: UH OH
RESET_PASSWORD.text: That login information didn’t work. Maybe you forgot. Do you want to try and reset your password?

ELIGIBILITY.name: ELIGIBILITY
ELIGIBILITY.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY.text: You’re covered. Just purchase any iPhone and you’re all set.

ELIGIBILITY_2.name: ELIGIBILITY
ELIGIBILITY_2.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY_2.text: You’re covered and eligible to join the Inner Circle — including our promotional service offer. Just purchase any iPhone and you’re all set.
